class_notes:
Lab Fee of $125.  Must attend two 3-hour training workshops outside of class - days/times TBD


Online Screening Component Required for Class
course_description: This course introduces students to basic technical digital video film making skills (camera operation, lighting, sound recording, non-linear editing) and to interview techniques through weekly exercises and study of major, creative documentaries. Weekly studio lab sessions required.
prerequisites: FILM 107 or FILM_OX 107 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
